item.title: Andrea add a quote by Kate McCarthy
item.description:
"I sucked in a few deep breaths. I could do this. I could.
I am a cool cucumber.
No, fuck that. I am Snoop Dogg. You can get no cooler than that." -- Kate McCarthy

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Claire Contreras
item.description: "Did you know you can't sit down for weeks if you get ass implants? Trust me, I googled that shit." -- Claire Contreras

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Joanna Wylde
item.description: "Fuck, this is gonna piss you off and then you aren’t gonna let me stick my dick in you,” he muttered. “Do you have to be so crude?” I snapped. “Have you met me?” “Who says I’d let you do it anyway?” “Babe,” he replied in a low, rough voice, raising his eyebrow at me." -- Joanna Wylde

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Karina Halle
item.description: "You know,” he began, voice low and full, “if you were to ever leave me, I’d come looking for you, on every street.” “You promise?” “Always.” And I knew he kept his promises." -- Karina Halle

item.title: Andrea add a quote by S.L. Jennings
item.description: "In my mind, I am this awesome, adventurous bad ass. But in reality, I am just a bookworm that really likes wine." -- S.L. Jennings

item.title: Andrea add a quote by J. Sterling
item.description:
"It's not that I can't live without you; it's that I don't want to. There's a difference. We all make choices in life and I choose you.
My heart belongs to you. And I'm not asking for it back, even if you won't want it anymore. I'm just asking for a chance to have your again. I promise I'll be more careful with it this time." -- J. Sterling

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Alison G. Bailey
item.description: "Sweetheart, there was so much eye fucking going on between the two of you, it was like an ophthalmologist's wet dream." -- Alison G. Bailey

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Ilsa Madden-Mills
item.description: "Is it true that soulmates always end up together? I didn't think so, but I hoped that if there was such a thing as reincarnation, we would meet again in a another life and try again. If it was possible, I'd find him, for another chance at love." -- Ilsa Madden-Mills

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Ilsa Madden-Mills
item.description: "I'm the only one for you, just me. You're my bad girl. No one else's." -- Ilsa Madden-Mills

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Shay Savage
item.description: "I’m going to make you feel so good,” I swore to her, “that you’re going to not just scream my name, but forget yours." -- Shay Savage

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Shay Savage
item.description: "How the fuck was I going to survive with this annoying, smoking hot bitch that I simultaneously wanted to fuck and kill?" -- Shay Savage

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Shay Savage
item.description: "I give you my life, my love, my soul,” I swore to her. “As long as I’m breathing, I’m yours." -- Shay Savage

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Shay Savage
item.description: "I didn’t marry the mob; I was born into it." -- Shay Savage

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Madeline Sheehan
item.description:
"But even after all this time, he'd stupidly held out hope, hadn't he? He'd clung to the memories of their time together like a fucking child clings to its baby blanket, unable to give it up even after that blanket had been chewed on, bled on, tattered, and finally shredded to pieces.
Even after that blanket was no longer a blanket but just a memory. That's all he and Dorothy were now. Just a fucking memory." -- Madeline Sheehan
